name: Your Life My Payment
description:
The city is under attack and needs a hero (or a mercenary). In Your Life My Payment, you need to save defenceless citizens against a creepy creature (maybe a little cute). You have a contract to work with the mayor of the city: for every soul saved, you make money. But if you fail the people of the city, you will have to pay a fine at the same price to the mayor.

Commands

A, W, S, D or directional keys = Character movement

E = Call a close citizen

Spacebar / Enter = Skip

ESC = Pause Menu

Goal

You should bring as many citizens as possible into the safe area (in red, at the centre of the map). For each rescued citizen you get $ 100 (and you lose that for each death)

Tools
  • Godot Engine (3.1.1)
  • Blender (for models)
  • LMMS (for Music)
  • Audacity (for SFX)
  • GIMP (for images)
  • Gitlab and Git
LD44

This is the first participation of @ jeison-pandini in Ludum Dare and the third submission of @rvenson. We had little time this weekend, but the goal of submitting some game was fulfilled. We would hope to add something to do with the money received and also more scenarios, but we appreciate the early feedback.

Jam Considerations
  • We recommend the download of Windows or Linux version, because the Web could be a little unstable
